fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Regional Policy, External Relations, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives: LDA is adopting EU SDGs locally by providing awareness rising campaign, as well as strengthening local democracy and citizen involvement.
organisation_name: Local Democracy Agency of Dnipropetrovsk region (LDA Dnipro)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
1.  Participatory Democracy Development in Territorial Communities (supported by NED); Main objective: to support and promote the development of integrated territorial communities in Dnipropetrovsk region, in accordance with democratic principles and laws of the country, providing an enabling environment for citizen participation and collective decision-making. 
 
2. UPDATE: Under covering Potential of civil servants to Develop Amalgamated Territorial Communities (supported by the Embassy of France to Ukraine). Project aim: to improve the quality of knowledge of the mid-level staff in the councils-centres of the amalgamated territorial communities of the Dnipropetrovsk region (hereinafter referred to as the ATC) in the sphere of decentralization and citizens’ engagement, using regional experience and international practices (the French approach). 
 
3. Joint Actions – to the Future: informal system for solving problem (supported by Dnipro City Council). Project aim: to increase citizens’ activity in solving social problems of territorial community, as well as to involve various groups of community population in joint initiatives implementation. 
 
4. . IDPs’ Social Adaptation as a Human Rehabilitation Vital Element (IDPs SAVE) (supported by Chiesa Valdese).  The overall objective of the project is to create favourable environment for adaptation and integration of IDPs into local communities, thus contributing to cohesion in society and stability in the region, minimizing possibility of conflicts and IDPs marginalization. The specific objective of the project is to provide young IDP people with skills necessary to integrate into the hosting society environment and establish contact and cooperation with young people from the hosting society, while ensuring raising awareness and mobilization of local actors for action.
